text: #Iran’s negotiating team is departing for #Geneva shortly for the second round of talks with the US. The delegation features a full composition of representatives across political, legal, technical, and economic fields.

Iranian official warned of "tremendous spoilers" i.e. "Israel, anti-Trump Democrats & Trump’s warmongering allies," attempting to wreck the talks. Due to this coalition of saboteurs, "#Iran delegation is proceeding with utmost caution and at the same time utmost creativity.”

An Iranian official tells Iran Nuances: "Iranians, having in mind the past experiences & June 2025 attacks, remain deeply suspicious of US intentions. Advancing diplomacy is extremely difficult due to shifting goalposts, US inconsistency & constant influence of Netanyahu’s lies."

#Iran's DepFM for Economic Affairs, also member of negotiating team, says US must benefit from high-yield, rapid-return economic sectors in Iran so as to ensure a sustainable deal. That can include joint oil/gas fields, mineral investments, urban development & aircraft purchases.
#Iran’s nuclear chief inspects construction progress at Bushehr #nuclear power plant Units 2 & 3, coinciding with the tentative scheduling of Iran-US talks on Tuesday in Geneva.
#Iran & #Iraq FMs had a phone call on Iran-US talks.

زمان و مکان دور بعدی مذاکرات #ایران و آمریکا به‌صورت مقدماتی تعیین شده که با سفر عباس عراقچی به ژنو برای شرکت در کنفرانس خلع‌سلاح سازمان ملل هم‌زمان خواهد بود. این گفتگوها همچنان با میانجی‌گری عمان انجام می‌شود، هرچند برگزاری نهایی آن نیازمند تایید قطعی است.

Venue and date for the next round of #Iran-US indirect talks have been tentatively set, coinciding with FM Araghchi’s scheduled appearance at UN Conference on Disarmament in Geneva this week, Iran Nuances has learnt. Talks will be mediated by Oman. It has to be confirmed, though.

#Iran FM Araghchi briefed Bahraini FM Al Zayani on the status of negotiations with the US during a phone call today. #Bahrain FM expressed hope that the ongoing dialogue yields results. The two diplomats agreed to maintain close consultations on bilateral and regional matters.

#Iran FM: I sincerely hope the coming year will be a Year of Peace and Tranquility, with Dialogue Prevailing over War. Our preference is diplomacy, and a deal on Iran’s peaceful #nuclear program is achievable; but only if fair and balanced.
#Iran's top security official Larijani clarifies the paper received in #Oman: We did not send a message to the US side; the Omanis conveyed American viewpoints for us to review in Tehran.
#Iran’s SNSC Secretary Ali Larijani left Doha for Tehran.
#Iran’s SNSC Secretary Ali Larijani met with senior #Hamas leaders in Qatar.
#Iran’s top security official: We have not received a specific proposal from US; Muscat was about exchange of messages… There is no talk of zero enrichment; we need it for energy & medicine.
The meeting of #Iran's top security official Larijani with the Emir of #Qatar today lasted around 2 hours. His session with the Sultan of Oman, yesterday in Muscat, was about 3 hours long.
Nationwide demonstrations were held in #Iran on Wednesday to celebrate the 47th anniversary of victory of the 1979 Islamic Revolution.
#Iran's top security official Larijani meets with #Qatar PM/FM in Doha, following the meeting with the Emir.

#Iran President: Recent events have caused great grief for the country & some of our dear people have lost their lives. We consider ourselves responsible before the people, we apologize to the nation, & we'll serve all those harmed... We're ready to hear the voice of the people.

#Iran’s top security official Larijani says the first round of the talks with the US were "relatively good" and that the US seemed to seek a solution, but judgment remains reserved until the process continues. He said the date for the next round is under review.

#Iran President: Regional issues must be resolved by regional countries, not outsiders. Iran is committed to peace through dialogue with neighbors, but rejects any foreign interference in determining the region’s trends and destiny.

#Iran President: We've repeatedly said we do not seek #nuclear weapons. But US & Europe have built a wall of mistrust through their actions, which is preventing the talks from reaching quick results. We're ready for talks with the framework of the red lines outlined by Leader.

#Iran’s top security official Ali Larijani is currently holding private talks with Sheikh Tamim, the Emir of #Qatar. After an initial public segment, the meeting continued in private and is still underway at the Amiri Diwan.
Emir of #Qatar had a phone conversation with the US President Trump, ahead of his meeting with #Iran's top security official Ali Larijani in Doha.
#Iran’s top security official Ali Larijani met with the Emir of #Qatar in Doha.
#Iran’s top security official Ali Larijani arrived in Doha today and immediately went to a meeting with the Emir of #Qatar
#Iran FM Araghchi spoke with #Pakistan’s FM/Deputy PM Ishaq Dar regarding negotiations with the US.
#Iran’s SNSC Secretary Ali Larijani met with Mohammad Abdulsalam, the spokesperson for #Yemen’s Ansarallah in Muscat.
A photo from the meeting between #Iran’s SNSC Secretary and #Oman’s Sultan in Muscat which lasted nearly 3 hours.
#Iran’s Armed Forces statement: Any threat will be met with a “more crushing and extensive” response.
A meaningful diplomatic gift: #China’s military attaché in Tehran met with #Iran’s Air Force Commander, presenting him with a model of J-20 stealth fighter.
#Iran’s top security official met with #Oman’s FM in Muscat.
#Iran’s top security official had a 3-hour long meeting with the Sultan of #Oman. He is now meeting FM Albusaidi.
#Iran's FM meets with Iran Army top commanders to discuss simultaneous use of defense and diplomatic capabilities to effectively counter foreign threats.

#Iran FM Spox (on #Netanyahu's visit to the US): The US is our negotiating partner and it is up to Washington to act independently of destructive pressures. US must not allow others to decide its foreign policy.
#Iran's top security official Ali Larijani, now in an ongoing visit to Oman, is set to travel to #Qatar, per Iran MFA Spox.
#Iran's top security official, Ali Larijani, met with the Minister of the Royal Office of the Sultanate of #Oman in Muscat.
#Iran's Defense Ministry says it will not publicly unveil defense capabilities due to security considerations and also to preserve the element of surprise.
#Iran’s top security official Ali Larijani arrives in Muscat. He is set to meet with #Oman’s Sultan & FM.
#Iran’s top security official Ali Larijani departed for Muscat. He is set to meet with #Oman’s Sultan & FM.

#Iran’s FM Araghchi & #UAE Minister of State Nusseibeh met in Tehran. UAE welcomed the resumption of Iran-US talks. Both emphasized “regional stability through dialogue.” FM Araghchi praised regional diplomatic efforts to reduce tension.
#Iran’s top security official Larijani to meet with #Oman’s Sultan Haitham bin Tariq and FM Badr Albusaidi in Muscat.

#Iran FM had separate phone calls with FMs of Türkiye, Egypt & Saudi Arabia, bringing them on talks with US in Muscat. He termed the talks a “good start” but stressed the need to remove mistrust regarding US intentions. The FMs welcomed the talks as vital for regional stability.

"Israeli PM Netanyahu is banking on two distinct groups to shift #Trump’s calculus and manipulate his mindset on #Iran: 'ultra-hawkish Republicans', and 'bankrupt Democrats' hungry for defeating US President in mid-terms,” a source tells Iran Nuances.

منبع آگاه به ایران نوانس: «نتانیاهو برای پیشبرد هدف تغییر محاسبات ترامپ و مهندسی ذهنیت او در قبال #ایران، روی دو گروه حساب باز کرده است: جمهوری‌خواهان فوق تندرو که عاشق جنگند و دموکرات‌های ورشکسته‌ای که تشنه شکست دادن رئیس‌جمهور آمریکا در انتخابات میان‌دوره‌ای هستند.»
#Iran and the #UAE hold a new round of Political Consultations Committee in Tehran, reviewing bilateral ties, and stressing "regional stability through dialogue and diplomatic solution."
#Iran’s Nuclear Chief on the potential dilution of 60% uranium: "This issue depends on whether, in return, they lift all sanctions or not."

#Iran’s President: Iran accepts equitable and win-win negotiations. Tehran stresses guaranteeing rights within the NPT framework, including enrichment rights and the lifting of sanctions... Iran extends a “hand of friendship” to those seeking honest cooperation.

#Iran’s President says the new round of #nuclear talks with the US is a "suitable opportunity for a just and balanced settlement." He added, "Iran is hopeful for a result, provided there is adherence to commitments and avoidance of excessive demands by the other side."

#Iran’s FM: I hope within next year we will witness the prevalence of diplomacy over war. Our policy is close cooperation with neighbors. I hope all sides will work together to prevent conflict and ensure stability.

#Iran's FM: We seek real negotiations with the US & are very serious to reach a result, provided that the other side is serious and ready for result-oriented talks. There is a long wall of mistrust towards the US. We hope that enough trust can be built to achieve a result.
#Iran's Leader: More than missiles and aircraft, national power is connected to the will and resistance of nations.
#Iran's top security official, Ali Larijani, will visit #Oman tomorrow Tuesday.

#Iran’s Parliament Speaker on the closed session with the FM and Armed Forces Chief of Staff: “It was a very good and effective meeting. We all believe that diplomacy and defense are two sides of the same coin.”
In a closed session in the Parliament on Monday morning, #Iran's FM and top military commander briefed MPs on the recent talks with the US and regional developments.

A senior Iranian official is set to visit #Oman in the coming days.
#Iran
یک مقام ارشد ایرانی قرار است طی روزهای آینده به #عمان سفر کند. این سفر در پی مذاکرات اخیر #ایران و آمریکا در مسقط انجام می شود.
#Iran's top military commander says a regional war would set the region’s progress and development back "by years", adding that Iranian Armed Forces are ready for a long-term war with the US.

#Iran’s FM says the US delegation in Muscat asked if the CENTCOM commander could participate in a diplomatic greeting with the Iranian FM. FM Araghchi says, "We rejected the request, saying we do not accept the presence of a military person within the negotiation."

#Iran’s FM: Time and venue of the next round of talks with the US will be determined in consultation with #Oman's Foreign Minister. The venue might change, just as before... The form of negotiation is not decisive; content and a fair approach are the criteria for agreement.

#Iran's FM: Tehran is reviewing the results of Muscat talks with US. Talks will continue if Tehran concludes the other side is serious. There are mixed signals regarding US seriousness. While some indicators show they are serious, continued sanctions & military moves cast doubt.
#Iran's FM: Where the negotiations [with the US] will lead is unclear. We do not trust them & even assume deception is likely.
#Iran's FM: Fear, in these conditions, is a deadly poison. Becoming afraid and yielding to pressure has no end point. If we take one step back, it is unclear how far we will have to retreat.

#Iran's FM: Negotiations [with the US] will only yield results when Iran’s rights are respected. We don’t need anyone to ‘recognize’ our right; our right already exists and is official. We simply demand it be respected and that we can exercise it.

#Iran's FM: Enrichment is a real need and part of our national independence and dignity. We are ready to address concerns and build trust, but we will never surrender our legal rights. Even if the cost is heavy, we will not retreat from our right to enrich.
#nuclear

#Iran's FM: We do not seek a #nuclear bomb; our ‘bomb’ is the power to say NO to great powers. US military buildup does not intimidate us. We are people of diplomacy & ready for war, but not warmongers. If they choose diplomacy, we follow that path.

#Iran’s President terms recent talks with US a “step forward,” reiterating that peaceful dialogue remains Tehran’s strategy. He said Tehran's logic regarding #nuclear issue is  based on NPT rights. He said Iran responds to respect with respect, but will not bear language of force

Source: Svengali at work again; as diplomacy emerges, Netanyahu rushes to whisper “poison pills” in #Trump’s ear. Demanding missile limits isn’t abt security, but a calculated move to manipulate US & torpedo talks before they gain traction.We'll see if US withstands or surrenders

منبع آگاه: باز هم آن افسونگر بدذات دست‌به‌کار شد؛ با شروع روندی دیپلماتیک، نتانیاهو شتابان به آمریکا می‌رود تا در گوش #ترامپ وسوسه کند. طرح محدودیت موشکی تلاش برای بازی دادن آمریکا و تخریب روند دیپلماتیک پیش از شروع آن است. باید دید آمریکا دچار وادادگی می‌شود یا می‌ایستد؟
Following a visit to Beijing and the recent talks with the US in Oman, #Iran’s Deputy FM Gharibabadi met with the ambassadors of #Russia and #China in Tehran today.
#Iran’s FM: Changing the venue for the second round of negotiations with the US is possible.
#Iran’s FM says no specific date has been set for the second round of negotiations with the US yet. However, he added that both Tehran and Washington agree that the talks should take place soon.
#Iran & #Qatar FMs met in Doha. They exchanged views on the recent Iran-US talks in Muscat.
#Iran’s Foreign Minister: Missiles cannot be negotiated, neither now nor in the future, because they are a defensive matter.

#Iran FM: We’re ready for a reassuring agreement on enrichment. Its level depends on our needs. For us, zero enrichment is off the table. Enrichment is our right & must continue; even through bombing, they were unable to destroy our capabilities. Enriched uranium won’t leave Iran
#Iran FM: Talks with US were a good start, but we have a long road ahead to build trust between us… The talks were conducted indirectly and addressed only #nuclear issue.
Trump says US had very good talks with Iran, going to meet again early next week.

دو منبع ایرانی و یک منبع عمانی به «ایران نوانس» گفتند گفتگوی کوتاه وزیر امور خارجه #ایران با مذاکره‌کنندگان آمریکایی (ویتکاف و کوشنر) در مسقط، یک احوالپرسی در عرف معمول دیپلماتیک بوده که در دورهای گذشته نیز انجام شده است.
#Iran FM arrives in Doha, #Qatar, following the talks with the US in Muscat.

The brief contact between #Iran’s Foreign Minister and US Presidential Envoy and Jared Kushner in Muscat was a simple greeting as a usual diplomatic practice that was done during the previous rounds as well, two Iranian sources and an Omani source told Iran Nuances.
Following the talks with the US in Oman, #Iran’s FM left Muscat for Doha to meet with #Qatar’s PM/FM and to attend the Al Jazeera forum.
#Oman's FM says the Muscat talks were "very serious" and "useful" to "identify areas for possible progress" between #Iran and the US.

#Iran FM (asked on regional security concerns): Talks are on nuclear matter. However, we emphasized that #nuclear talks & resolving key issues require a calm atmosphere, devoid of tension or threats. Refraining from pressure is a prerequisite for any dialogue. We said this today.

"A good start", said #Iran’s FM adding that the talks with US took place in a “very good atmosphere.” While they've agreed to continue negotiations, the specific “how” requires consultation in capitals. Optimism remains that a framework can be reached if this momentum continues.
#Iran and the US talks in Muscat have concluded. Delegations will return to capitals for further consultations.
Footages from Oman Foreign Minister’s talks with #Iran’s Foreign Minister Araghchi and US Presidential Envoy Witkoff and #Trump’s adviser Kushner.
#Iran’s Defense Minister met with #Azerbaijan’s President in Baku.
#Iran FM to start the second round of the talks in Muscat.
#Oman’s Foreign Minister and US Presidential Envoy Witkoff meet in Muscat, following the Omani FM’s talks with #Iran’s FM.
#Iran & #Oman FMs met in Muscat.
#Iran’s FM Araghchi and the Iranian team are heading to the negotiation venue in Muscat.

#Iran’s Foreign Minister is going to hold a meeting with Oman’s Foreign Minister ahead of the talks with the US. Iran-US talks might begin with a brief delay, previously scheduled for 10 am local time.
A photo of #Iran’s FM Araghchi, DepFM Ravanchi and DepFM for Economic Affairs Ghanbari during Tehran-Muscat flight.
#Iran’s FM Araghchi arrives in Muscat for the talks with the US.
#Iran’s FM departed for Muscat, Oman, for #nuclear talks with the US.
#Iran’s President appointed Ali Shamkhani as the Secretary of the Defense Council.

#Iran's top military commander inspects an underground missile base of the #IRGC, saying, "Iran has strengthened its deterrence capability by upgrading its ballistic missiles in all technical dimensions... We are prepared to confront any action taken by the enemy."
